headline: New York City Mayor Eric Adams has fielded proposals for a private-sector gig or a job in the Trump administration in exchange for ending his re-lection bid, but he insists he isn’t dropping out

The U.S. is getting ready to start a renegotiation of its largest free trade deal—the U.S.-Mexico-Canada Agreement.
